<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Follow-Up Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=2019) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 182 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Martial Artist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=67)

**Prerequisites**
[Martial Artist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2018)

**Requirements**
Your last action was a missed Strike with a melee unarmed attack.

</column>

---

You have trained to use all parts of your body as a weapon, and when you miss with an attack, you can usually continue the attack with a different body part and still deal damage. Make another Strike with a melee unarmed attack, using the same multiple attack penalty as for the missed Strike, if any.
name: Follow-Up Strike
requirement: Your last action was a missed Strike with a melee unarmed attack.
